text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/d032f34a51c6722101626c4167dffecc427ac343|patch 8.2.1238: Vim9: a few remaining errors not caught by try/catch>
patch 8.2.1238: Vim9: a few remaining errors not caught by try/catch

Problem:    Vim9: a few remaining errors not caught by try/catch.
Solution:   Do not bail out if an error is inside try/catch.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1238: Vim9: a few remaining errors not caught by try/catch · vim/vim@d032f34
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1238: Vim9: a few remaining errors not caught by try/catch · vim/vim@d032f34
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: a few remaining errors not caught by try/catch. Solution: Do not bail out if an error is inside try/catch.

patch 8.2.1239: "maxwidth" in 'completepopup' not obeyed

Problem:    "maxwidth" in 'completepopup' not obeyed. (Jay Sitter)
Solution:   Add separate field for value from option. (closes #6470)

attachments.title: patch 8.2.1239: "maxwidth" in 'completepopup' not obeyed · vim/vim@de2396f
attachments.text: Problem: "maxwidth" in 'completepopup' not obeyed. (Jay Sitter) Solution: Add separate field for value from option. (closes #6470)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/10e1d01aaf5504675fd9197c75d1da0de0e5b429|patch 8.2.1240: GUI tests sometimes fail because of translations>
patch 8.2.1240: GUI tests sometimes fail because of translations

Problem:    GUI tests sometimes fail because of translations.
Solution:   Reload the menus without translation. (Taro Muraoka, closes #6486)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1240: GUI tests sometimes fail because of translations · vim/vim@10e1d01
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1240: GUI tests sometimes fail because of translations · vim/vim@10e1d01
attachments.text: Problem: GUI tests sometimes fail because of translations. Solution: Reload the menus without translation. (Taro Muraoka, closes #6486)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/6434fc574dfbde11461e70e5a62712370edf38e6|patch 8.2.1241: cannot use getbufinfo() as a method>
patch 8.2.1241: cannot use getbufinfo() as a method

Problem:    Cannot use getbufinfo() as a method.
Solution:   Support using getbufinfo() as a method. (closes #6458)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1241: cannot use getbufinfo() as a method · vim/vim@6434fc5
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1241: cannot use getbufinfo() as a method · vim/vim@6434fc5
attachments.text: Problem: Cannot use getbufinfo() as a method. Solution: Support using getbufinfo() as a method. (closes #6458)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/65b9545f4494abcb455400c08e51de27bc305866|patch 8.2.1242: Vim9: no error if calling a function with wrong type>
patch 8.2.1242: Vim9: no error if calling a function with wrong type

Problem:    Vim9: no error if calling a function with wrong argument type.
Solution:   Check types of arguments. (closes #6469)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1242: Vim9: no error if calling a function with wrong type · vim/vim@65b9545
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1242: Vim9: no error if calling a function with wrong type · vim/vim@65b9545
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: no error if calling a function with wrong argument type. Solution: Check types of arguments. (closes #6469)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/75783bd84e42e8431e4a62dfbabc9be1a1e56901|patch 8.2.1243: Vim9: cannot have a comment line halfway a list>
patch 8.2.1243: Vim9: cannot have a comment line halfway a list

Problem:    Vim9: cannot have a comment or empty line halfway a list at script
            level.
Solution:   Skip more than one line if needed.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1243: Vim9: cannot have a comment line halfway a list · vim/vim@75783bd
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1243: Vim9: cannot have a comment line halfway a list · vim/vim@75783bd
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: cannot have a comment or empty line halfway a list at script level. Solution: Skip more than one line if needed.

text:

patch 8.2.1244: Vim9: in lambda index assumes a list

Problem:    Vim9: in lambda index assumes a list.
Solution:   Use the value type to decide about list or dict. (closes #6479)

attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: in lambda index assumes a list. Solution: Use the value type to decide about list or dict. (closes #6479)
